Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This falafel sandwich on wheat  roll was good. It was a lot, I couldn‚Äôt finish it all. I didn‚Äôt like that it was very messy falling out the roll sauce was all over my hands. The workers were friendly. I got there early before the crowd arrived. This place can get very crowded  during lunch time.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I would argue that this is the best falafel place in town, and have been coming here for the past 10 years.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
I like my falafel fresh and crispy. Which mine was not. I also like fresh pita.

Despite not having those two things, this place is still delicious. Filled with ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great sandwiches, generous portion, friendly and quick service! The price is reasonable for the portion and the quality you get. Will definitely return.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Wow!!! The food was amazing. Pita bread was soft, toppings in perfect proportion, and falafel cooked perfectly. Be sure to bring cash and an appetite!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: By far my absolute favorite falafel place in the city and I've tried a bunch. Not a whole lot of seating but for lunch I've found more tend to carry out and maybe even same for dinner but regardless I've never had trouble finding a spot. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This is definitely my new favorite kosher spot whenever I am in the city in Philadelphia they have amazing falafel sandwiches and a great salad to go along with it as well. Very friendly staff and the line usually isn't too big it's just a ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This is the best, most amazing falafel sandwich I've ever had!! Incredibly fast service! Their falafel is so fresh and full of flavor! Their pita is pillowy and it does perfectly with their super smooth and flavorful hummus. They are always ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel in Philly, hands down. Also if you love boardwalk fries, the five minutes these take to make fresh are well worth the wait. Amazing vegan options, including the baklava!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel in the city hands down. I can not recommend this place enough. Even meat eaters will be happy here. The staff is lovely and have given free samples while I waited on a long line. The worst part is the seating, there is not ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Everything was so fresh and I could tell they use very high quality ingredients! It was absolutely delicious! One falafel was more then enough the portion was very generous! ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel outside of Israel. Not even close. Food is very fresh and service is quick. Gets pretty crowded during peak lunchtime but line moves quickly. Credit cards are not accepted so make sure to bring cash.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This places is the BEST! Once you try it, you start to have very specific cravings for it. When my body screams "go to Mama's for a falafel platter" I listen. Everything is always fresh & delicious. Prices are good, quality is consistent, portions are perfect. EAT HERE!!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: We normally try not to re-visit restaurants when we go on trips - especially in a city like Philly where there are just so many great restaurants - but we couldn't help it with Mama's... The falafel is too good. We visited around lunch time ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Had the large falafel sandwich. The falafel balls aren‚Äôt bad, average quality, but the sandwich as a whole is insipid ‚Äî and overpriced at $8 for the underwhelming quality. The slaw added to the sandwich is tasteless, the hot sauce and ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: BEST falafels in Philly-- you have the option of getting a falafel pita or falafel salad. The falafels are well cooked and super tasty. We got the pita and it was delicious!!! The different spicy sauces were so good, definitely ask for a few of them to try it. The  place is small but enough room for a sit down meal with friends.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The wife and I love the falafel here. Always delicious and fresh and the staff are very courteous. Very affordable for Rittenhouse as well. Some complain about the cash only part, but it‚Äôs to be expected with these smaller businesses. If the ATM surcharge is that deep, walk 1 min to Wawa and pull money out there with no surcharge lol.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The falafels here are always fresh and always delicious. Service is super nice but sometimes a bit scatter brained. Come expecting a wait, but that's because they only serve their falafels fresh out of the frier and crunchy. Delicious and unbelievably cheap

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Listen if you‚Äôre in Philly! You have to stop here for food! I‚Äôve had falafel everywhere  but it‚Äôs hard to find Falafel as delicious as Mama vegetarian! Their food is fresh as hell! ALWAYS! Their falafel is absolutely delicious! Unmatched! They deserve more stars!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Love this place. It's a simple menu with nice people working in there. I always get the spicy falafel on wheat. They also make fresh carrot juice and fries. Yummy.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Amazing falafel, on par with Amsterdam Falafel in DC, and much better than Goldie's in Philly.  Nearly as good as the best I found in Israel.  I would absolutely wait in their fast moving line again.  In fact, after I finished my falafel salad plate I waited in line again to get falafel pita!  I just which they offered baba ghanoush.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great falafel and latkes. The Samantha's platter is the way to go. The actual prices are a dollar more than the yelp reviews indicate. But overall an overall great experience and the staff really are extremely helpful. This is a must visit

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The staff was nice initially and then it went bad. They did not wash their hands before touching the pita bread. When I told the employee she responded rudely and said all of the employees touch the pita bread with their bare hands. She ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: It's a little regimented in the ordering experience and hard to get a table, but man does Mama's deliver. The falafel sandwiches are huge and delicious!  I always envy my co-workers who have made a lunchtime trip.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The best falafels in center city. Also, when compared to Goldie (also a top tier falafel place) the service is so much better and incredibly fast. The line moves so quickly.. Just remember, they are cash only

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Fast and efficient service, although it wouldn't hurt the staff to smile every now and then. Excellent falafel and the kuba is very impressive too. Limited menu but it's all very tasty!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: We met with friends at this place for lunch. my friend recommended this place.  Well, it was very nice. The staff were extremely nice and we felt very good. The food was just great. We loved this restaurant a lot and we will definitely return to this restaurant. Keep it up.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Magnificent place for vegetarians and carnivores alike. I'm a meat eater and this is one of my favorite lunch spots in the city. Homemade pita bread, great falafel with lots of veggies, pickle bar with spicy whole peppers. Be prepared for a fast moving line most days at lunch.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I absolutely LOVE the authencity of this place. The food is mind blowing to the point that they have a line out the door everyday for lunch. With every sandwich they give u little cup for fresh fruits and acutramae which is awesome. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Good falafel. Not as hyped as they make it sound when you talk to folks about it. There are some good alternatives even from chains. Just down the road nafnaf is a great option for falafel and has a few more things on the menu. In a competing world, mama's should start thinking of adding value one way or another

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
BEST FALAFEL in philadelphia so far.

Wife and I either share the mama falafel platter and/or falafel sandwich. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The falafel, grape leaves, and salads are off the charts fabulous. A great inexpensive meal. The store is spotless, but tiny and very uncomfortable. However, the food is so delicious, its worth the hassle.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Being the good Jewish boy I am, I completely respect a restaurant being closed or closing early for Jewish holidays.  What I don't respect is going to a restaurant at 6:30 pm, when they close at 7:30pm, to be completely disappointed.  We ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This is the best place for pitas and falafel in Philly. Cheap and delicious! They only take cash though so make sure you take some out ahead of time. The pitas are huge and fresh.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Good food.  Quick for getting a bite for lunch at work.  Small little shop.  Not a big menu, but never been disappointed in their food.  Fries are awesome and made to order.  Not expensive either.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
Nathan Phieffer is a jerk for giving this place a 1 star review.

He said the food and service was good, you can't give a bad review based on ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel on this side of the Atlantic. If they put fries in the pita and offered Lafa bread it would be 100% the same as it is served in Israel. The fruit juices are good but pretty sweet if you aren‚Äôt used to them. Make sure to take ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Always busy around lunchtime. Service is fast and friendly.  Food is fresh and well seasoned.  I often get the latke sandwich - spicy. It's very filling and enjoyable.  They are cash only.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: It's amazing falafel and vegetarian store! Prices are reasonable and good for a quick bite. Plus it's Kosher! Just make sure you have cash because they don't accept credit cards!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great food and quick service. But to only accept cash and then have an ATM IN THE STORE THAT CHARGES $2.50 PER TRANSACTION, (as seen in the 360¬∞ picture up top) is ridiculous and dishonest! (And many banks will charge an additional fee for using a random ATM.)  They may as well accept cards and jack up the prices!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I walked past this restaurant last week and saw the line out the door so what is yelper to do??? ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I thought I had found some of the best falafal elsewhere in Philadelphia, and boy was I wrong. If you're vegetarian, or simply love falafal, this place is heaven. I completely understand why there was a line out the door when I went here, ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Mama‚Äôs is traditional street food falafel served in foil and wrapped perfectly for one the go eating or just eating there. The pickled salad bar is on point from pickled hot peppers to pickled endives. Needless to say they are always ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
Couldnt tell you what the food tasted like.
The falafel boy and probable owner refused to give me and my partner plates to eat our falafels as well as our additional salad plate that we were sharing. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The best falafel I've had in the city, hands down. The staff is friendly, and the prices are quite reasonable. I recommend the mama's sandwich, or the samantha's platter. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Perfect meal for vegetarians and others as well. Try small mamas falafel for 5$. Its amazing how much you can get for 5$. The food is delicious and filling. Dont miss free salad bar and fried chilly.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Soooo good.  Had the falafel and had it spicy.  Not much room.  You order and eat it probably standing up by their sidebars, but the food was so good and authentic.  Their spicy sauce is indeed spicy.  Soooo good.....

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: No other felafel compares to mama‚Äôs! Tastes so authentic and delicious. Happy I walked over there during my stay in center city. Great place to get lunch.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: my favorite falafel place yet. excellent sandwiches, hummus, veggies, sauces. oh the hot sauce and white sauce is to die for. and a salad bar to add your favorite fixings like pickles and peppers. so sad i moved away from the phila area bcz i loved this place. excellent!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This 1 star rating is not a reflection of the food which is delicious.  Nor, is it representative of the "entire" staff which until today has been more than pleasant.  This 1 star rating, is for the 1 employee that provided me with the 1 ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The place does not look like much, in fact it does not look inpressive at all, but I really like thier food. The latkas can be made spicy, which I really like. The place is always full and many days a line out the door at lunch hour. They are closed for all Jewish holidays and I think 2 of the holidays they are closed for a week.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Absolutely incredible food and very large portions! Everything is so delicious. Personal favorite is the falafel platter with some fried eggplant on the side.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best balls in the city! The service is always great. I feel right at home every time. The owner is extremely charming and generous. I can't wait to visit again. Get the carrot juice. It'll keep you regular.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This review is not necessarily reflective of the food. It is reflective of unprofessional and unpleasant service. I ordered a catering service two days in advanced to arrive at 11:30 for our event. We called multiple times, but the company ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
It was the best place ever now it's closed down for good so sad üò¢
PS please let me know if you reopen I will change my review to a 5 star because they had the best food.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Small busy kosher falafel place...prices went up a bit...the pita is okay...the real deal is to get just a combo of falafel balls and hummus for 4 dollars..and then they have a free pickle/veggie bar with condiments..the fries look really good..but the eggplant and latkes are too fried

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This is one of my favorite cheap eats in philly. Get the spicy falafel and enjoy. The line can be long sometimes but it moves fast. And a free pickle bar with your order!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: While this place is not perfect, it effectively strikes a very delicate balance for me in terms of quality, nutrition, price, and taste. A few cents more and I would consider it over-priced for what it is. The ingredients are just balanced enough and fresh enough for me to be willing to pay the listed price.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: They have the best falafels!! They are absolutely delicious and the rest of their food is good too. And the staff is very courteous and friendly and helpful

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel in the city plain and simple. Just judge by the long line around lunch time. Love this place. Fries are really good too.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
Wow!
Delicious. Service was pretty fast. Moved through customers almost as quick as Moishe's falafel truck in NYC. During the busy lunch hour.
Gr

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Hands down best falafel outside of Israel. Perfect texture and flavor. Delicious pickled vegetable bar.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Had the falafel sandwich and falafel platter. The falafel was a bit soft in the sandwich but crispy in the salad. The crispy one I perfected better. Great salad bar tho!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Food never disappoints. Some of the best falafel and latkes I've had. Service was a bit slow today, but the quality and value of the food far overshadowed it.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: fabulous prices, a taste that cannot be beat evidently they make the falafel fresh !! better than I've had in a long time reminds me of Israel

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel in town, even after all the new competition. They have raised prices recently but still a good deal for quality food.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Solid vegetarian falafel joint, with a fantastic pickle bar. Great for lunch, although expect a wait around 12-1, because this is a very popular place (and with good reason).

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This is a really small restaurant with just a few tables, and they don't have a wide selection of food, but what they make they make well. The falafel is really good!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This is the best falafel!!! I thought I didnt like falafels until I tried their latki falafel with their homemade coleslaw on top. I moved out of the city and still think about this place all the time.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I go here for their amazing falafel sandwiches. And their pickle bar, with pickled radishes, and all kinds of things. And the music they play rocks in a great way.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: So delicious! Came from NJ and really glad I chose to give it a try despite rough outer appearance. Falafel and fries were top notch.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: One of the best falafel I've ever had. Very high quality food, prompt service. Note that this place is cash only.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great food and once saw the cook come out and physically remove a guy who was trying to get money from customers. Overall a great experience. CASH ONLY though so make sure to hit the ATM.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
Food A+
Attitude a solid 0....may be a prejudice by a particular employee against patrons that are not Jewish. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Seriously good falafel.  I do feel the falafel truck on 20th and market is the best in the city.  But, if your looking for a traditional falafel, this is the place to go hands down!!!!!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Excellent salad and good service.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Some of the best vegetarian falafel in the city! I would definitely recommend adding their eggplant to your falafel sandiwch. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Easily the best falafel in the city. Top 5 food item in the city, regardless of whether or not you're a vegetarian.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The only reason im giving a 4 out if five is because i cant give a 4 9/10 because the hot sauce is a tad bit too spicy,but overall,amazing falafel and foods.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Good prices, however, customer service was rude, i.e., acting like they were too busy and a customer asking questions was an annoyance.  CASH ONLY business, which I find an inconvenience....they should accept cards AND cash.  The main killer, for me, was the rudeness.  Won't go back.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Excellent Good and customer service! I have coming to Mama's for over ten years and each time the food gets better. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel on the east coast, can be busy at times. Seating is a little cramped, but comfortable when not overcrowded.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: My favorite falafel in the city. I always order the mamas falafel and am never disappointed. Cash only though.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel sandwich in Philadelphia, maybe in PA, maybe in the PANJDE area.  So delicious.  Highly recommend.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This place easily has the best Israeli food I've ever had, the mouthwatering hummus, convenient setup and good prices make it one of the best lunch spots in the city.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Friendly and prompt service. DELICIOUS food every visit! Only negative is that the room only seats around 30 to 25 individuals. Also, beware that it is cash only.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
‚ÄúCan I please get a large Mama‚Äôs?‚Äù
‚ÄúWhite or wheat?‚Äù
‚ÄúWheat please.‚Äù ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great food with quick service. Was just annoyed that they don‚Äôt take credit card. I had to get cash from the ATM machine in order to pay. That‚Äôs so 25 years ago.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel you will get. Staff is awesome. Worth the wait (if there is one) every time!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I usually avoid vegan and veg places but damn, na Mama's is good food. Wish they had Kobe beef though.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: One of my favorite places to get lunch in Philadelphia.  Service is always fast and friendly.  And falafels are delicious.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: They have the best greasy French fries am I love their full awful sandwich. Make sure you have cash they have a Mac machine in the store.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: super Delicious food. ......falafel pita/Fried eggplant etc.... Great attitude great place loved it hope to be back soon

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Do not let "vegetarian" dissuade you. The falafel, humus, and literally everything else on the menu is a delicious combination of flavors.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel in Center City. Latkes are awesome too. Sometimes the wait can be a bit crazy at peak lunch time.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: One of my top places for delicious Vegetarian food. Fast, efficient, and courteous service. Prices were appropriate.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: This has to be the best falafel anywhere in the United States.  And I have almost been to all of them üòÄ. You can't beat price either.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Small menu, but everything here is great. Don't be discouraged if you see a line out the door, they're extremely fast.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Falafel is classic but try the sleeper, the sabich (fried eggplant + hardboiled egg). Good mix of fresh toppings on top, too.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great spot for good falafel. Quite a line during lunch times, but great platters and good customer service.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Fresh, friendly, fast and delicious! Best eggplant ever! Falafel is amazing.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Went there during lunch rush and the line was out the door. Even then, I got to the counter and was eating some seriously delicious food within ten minutes. Highly recommended.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Their platters are excellent! Love the fried eggplant, I normally would never eat it but theirs is really good!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Excellent, authentic falafel. Small facilities, but the food makes it worth your while.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Nice place for a quick and tasty falafel. Most of their menu is vegan.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best felafel sandwich in town. There is a line out the door every day for lunch, but it moves quickly.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: So very good. Cash only. Had the falafel sandwich and the latke. I recommend both!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best Israeli falafel and salad in Center City. A bit expensive and always crowded, but completely worth the money and the wait.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Glad I stumbled across this place while looking for a lunch spot in Philly.  Food was great!  Keep in mind, it is cash only!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Good food and friendly staff but bring cash, because they don't take credit cards. There is an ATM, and several banks at the corner.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: First time at Mama's, went with coworkers. It's a "must try" if you're in the area. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I'm a carnivore to the max and even I love this place.  Go here and try the falafel it's one of the better ones in the city.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Oh my god their falafels are amazing! Worth the cash only situation there.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Don't overlook the fries. Some of the best falafel I've ever had too.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The best falafel in Philly and maybe even America. Cozy little place but don't let the appearance deceive you.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Dont forget to take cash and big appetite when you come here. Awesome vegetarian food and quick service. This one should not be missed

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: What a shame that they're still closed. Visiting Phili is almost pointless without the convenience and experience of this kosher spot

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Yum. My favorite falafel place in Philly. Really friendly service and food is fresh.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Awesome Vegetarian place. Falafel is very good. * Cash Only

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel ever. Amazing fried eggplant. We'll definitely be back!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
Food was great. Service was quick and friendly. Place was clean. Take my stars.
"It ain't Israel but it is a good second"

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great falafel sandwich. Zero ambiance, but who cares.  Food is great.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: One of the best falafels I had in USA. Amazing service and great pricing.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: THE best falafel sandwiches hands down!  They make their own pitas too!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Their falafel sandwich is among the best! Get it with the spicy sauce.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Seriously the best falafel outside Israel and a contender against any Israeli falafel as well.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Very tasty, Veggie paradise.  Not too expensive. Best Falafel.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Still the best falafel in the city, and probably the best I‚Äôve had in the US!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text:
Not sure why a business wouldnt acknowledge  a customer. decided to walk out. cash only was dissapointing as well.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Trust me you will not miss non vegetarian food after eating here. Best Mediterranean food in phily.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: I tried the falafel sandwich for the first time a few days ago and I still have cravings for more.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: They should really start accepting card payments and maybe I'd come a lot more often... Great food though

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: They make the best falafel I have ever had.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Great food, great service, only issue is: 'no credit cards' (!!!) Cash only, they have ATM inside with $2.50 surcharge.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: The falafel sandwich was delicious and the French Fries were hot and crisy

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best falafel in the city. Can be skimpy at times and generous at other times.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Fun staff, great food. Will definitely be returning there soon!

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Best Falafel I've ever eat ... So delicious ...

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Hands down best falafel in the city. Tastes like it does in Israel

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: a lot of hype behind this place, and dont get me wrong their food is pretty good, but it doesnt hold a candle goldie.

Review Text: Food was great, the staff was very friendly and price was reasonable. Looking forward to my next visit.

Name: Mama's vegiarian kitchen
Review Text: Really good food here. I love the mamas meal its a good price for what you get and taste

Review Text: Amazing falafel place and nice funky vibe in the restaurant.
